name: teams-full-report
title: Teams Full Report
shortDescription: Script to generate Team's full report, gathering all Teams,Channels,Tabs available info.
longDescription: Script to generate Team's full report, gathering all Teams,Channels,Tabs available info. The script is a subset of the SPO powershell packages with content (PnPCandy) concept already been used across many projects.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.

references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
